mapper.sql: article_id, user_id, article_type, article_is_del, article_title, article_create_time, article_like
mapper.insert: insert into ccp_musicessay_article (article_id, user_id, article_type, article_is_del, article_title, article_create_time, article_like, article_text) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

article_id,
user_id,

mapper.update:
update ccp_musicessay_article
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_is_del = #{articleIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_create_time = #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
article_like = #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_text = #{articleText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_musicessay_article set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_is_del = #{articleIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_create_time = #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, article_like = #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_text = #{articleText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_musicessay_article set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type = #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_is_del = #{articleIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_title = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_create_time = #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, article_like = #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cma.article_title, cma.article_id, cma.article_text, cma.article_create_time, cma.article_is_del, cma.article_like, cmu.user_real_name, cmu.user_moblie_no from ccp_musicessay_article cma left join ccp_musicessay_user cmu on cma.user_id=cmu.user_id where 1=1 and cma.article_id=#{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
